comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: Fred Merkle of the New York Giants, also known as "Bonehead Merkle" for a grievous mistake that enabled the Chicago Cubs to win the National League pennant and the 1908 World Series (the last time the Cubs ever won it): en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fred_Merkle "Merkle's Boner": en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Merkle's_Boner
